name: tunarr
description: Tunarr is a self-hosted pseudo-live TV channel generator that creates custom channels from Plex or Jellyfin libraries and streams them as continuous linear feeds.
features: Channel creation: Create custom TV channels from your Plex or Jellyfin media libraries.
Continuous streaming: Generate linear TV feeds that play continuously like traditional broadcast channels.
Schedule programming: Build channel schedules with specific shows, movies, or content blocks.
Multiple channels: Create multiple channels for different genres, themes, or family members.
Commercial breaks: Insert custom content or filler between programs for authentic TV experience.
Random playback: Shuffle content within time slots for variety while maintaining schedule structure.
EPG generation: Generate electronic program guides for compatible TV apps and clients.
Media server integration: Pull content directly from Plex or Jellyfin without duplicating files.
Web interface: Configure channels and schedules through an intuitive web-based interface.
Stream compatibility: Stream to devices that support M3U playlists or IPTV protocols.
Time-based programming: Schedule different content for different times of day or days of week.
Filler content: Add bumpers, commercials, or other filler content between programs.
